activities: Management of information regarding: 1) key coded anonymized clinical subject research data for the purposes of conducting clinical trials and 2) information relating to existing and potential clinical investigators, site management personnel, vendors and clients for the purposes of conducting clinical trials. Management of Clinipace human resources and recruitment data regarding information for existing and potential Clinipace employees or contractors.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Key coded anonymized clinical subject trial data, clinical investigator data, third party clinical site personnel data, and current and potential employee, contractor, vendor and client data
recoursemech: Swiss Data Protection Authorities (Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner)
